prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Guitar, Drums, Bass, Organ, but without Reed.
captions:
Style 1:
This piece of music features the sounds of Guitar, Drums, Bass, and Organ, but no Reed.

Style 2:
This song is composed of Guitar, Drums, Bass, and Organ, but Reed is absent.

Style 3:
This composition is comprised of Guitar, Drums, Bass, and Organ, Reed excluded.
